Name: Aim Bot
About the game: Aim Bot is a game designed to highly improve your aiming skills in a short amount of time. Create your own training or play levels specified to train aim in different situations. 3 Types of training: 1.Levels - 30 different training levels with different quests and guns. Every level is targeted to practice a different type of aim. 2. Training - Create any training you can imagine with an intuitive editor. Upload it and compete with other players, or just save it for yourself. 3.AI training - Create custom battle against enemies. Customize their guns, shape, movement, aim patterns, and much more. You can also add obstacles and teammates. Upload it and compete. Other features: Third person Sensitivity converter for almost every game - CS: GO, Valorant, Fortnite, Overwatch, Paladins, QCDE, Rainbow 6 Siege, Quake, Apex Legends, and Warframe Currency - Earn in-game currency by training your aim. Buy skins, music tracks, and much more. Crosshair editor - Customize your crosshair the way you want. Guns - 6 different guns, each customizable. Music - There are more than 30 high-quality music tracks in the game. Skins - Customize wall textures, guns, and more. Feedback - Your opinion matters, send your ideas via Discord or in-game UI, and it might get implemented in the next update.
